plot: A look at Capital Punishment in India during the sixties. A fictional piece set in a historic background during which anti-capital punishment revolutions started. It depicts a father's dilemma when his own son is sentenced to death
title: India, 1964
plot_es: A look at Capital Punishment in India during the sixties. A fictional piece set in a historic background during which anti-capital punishment revolutions started. It depicts a father's dilemma when his own son is sentenced to death
